title: Posters for Change: Tear, Paste, Protest: 50 Removable Posters
description:
Make your voice heard with this collection of 50 tear-out posters created by designers from around the globe! This collection of posters is made for—and by—people who want to make their voices heard in a time of unprecedented political activism and resistance. Posters for causes like:

• Animal Rights
• Child Labor
• Civil Rights
• Climate Change and the Environment
• Gun Control
• Health Care Access
• Immigration
• LGBTQ and Gender Rights
• Mass Incarceration
• Public Arts
• Voting Rights
• Women's Rights

Proceeds from the publisher are donated to the following nonprofit organizations: Advocates for Human Rights, Border Angels, Honor the Earth, and the Sylvia Rivera Law Project.

A foreword by Avram Finkelstein, a designer for the AIDS art activist collective Gran Fury, looks at the crucial role of graphic activism in the current political climate.
  • Format: Softcover
  • Dimensions: 11 x 14 in.
  • Pages: 112
